author: brett
msg: putting back the original version. The new one had the wrong password, and when I tried to use two databases with ref's it didn't work. It's important to have separate user database for development since you regularly nuke the Continuum one and don't want to have to adjust the users again

author: joerg
msg: It seems with a new version of Maven's eclipse plugin after running eclipse:eclipse I get .externalToolBuilders and maven-eclipse.xml in EVERY project directory. Is there any way to set them to svn:ignore in batch than every one by hand?
